name: 2D Infinite Runner (Sidescroller)
description:
I worked on this game back when i was an intern at Altitude Games. It's a simple 2D infinite runner game with an enemy to dodge through jumping, gems to collect and some power-ups! Gems can be spent in the Store for power-up upgrades and stuff.  Added some keyboard controls too because this game was originally meant for mobile. Enjoy!

All sprites are from https://kenney.nl

Update #1 - New in this update:

- You can now continuously jump when holding the Space Bar
- Fixed delay with jumping animation
- Fixed ground not scrolling properly
- Fixed Shield overlaping 
- Fixed UI animations
